name: hm02
effect: Teaches Fly to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Fly to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
Flies up on the
first turn, then
attacks next turn.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
Flies up on the
first turn, then
attacks next turn.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
A 2-turn move that
hits on the 2nd
turn. Use it to fly
to any known town.
flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
The user soars, then strikes on the
second turn. It can also be used to
fly to any familiar town.
